Paragraph.Text: Le Royal Hotel Beirut is perched on a towering hilltop over the Mediterranean Sea. Located 15 km from Beirut downtown and nearby the famed Jeita Grotto, Casino Du Liban, old souks of historic Byblos, Ski resorts and the upscale shopping districts. Le Royal Beirut features 231 elegant and spacious guest rooms and Suites equipped with every modern convenience. The Suite apartment’s floor, located on floors 1-4, features equipped kitchenette, living rooms, terraces and a free access to Private pools with greensward area surrounding. The Deluxe Floor, located on floors 5 -10, features spacious units with free access to the panoramic outside pool. Deluxe Disable rooms and lifts are available on the premises. The Royal Club Rooms and Suites, located on floor 11 – 12, features luxurious amenities with complimentary Breakfasts and refreshments in the Royal Executive lounge. All rooms and Suites offer high-speed internet, data port, and TV interactive games, safe and furnished balconies. -Eml:info@leroyalbeirut.Com -url:www.Lhw.Com/royalbeirut . . - Bey-international . . . . . . . .12.4 MI- 20.0 KM -location: distance to city center 9.3mi-15.0km - le royal hotels and resorts - beirut is perched on a towering hilltop overlooking the mediterranean sea 15 kilometers from downtown and the airport. Surrounded by the embassies the property is close to the magnificent jeita grotto nominated one of the 7 wonders casino du liban the historic city and souks of byblos ski resorts and upscale shopping districts. The 231 guest rooms and suites are equipped with every modern convenience. Some suites feature kitchenettes living rooms and terraces. The guests in the royal club rooms and suites receive complimentary breakfast refreshments and happy hours in the royal club lounge. High speed wireless internet is available in all rooms and suites so are facilities for disabled guests. Gastronomy is an important part of le royal hotels and resorts. Le jardin du royal overlooking the panoramic pool offers breakfast seafood italian and mexican fare and barbecue nights in the summer with live music. The titanic is a piano bar with a maritime feel offering french and continental specialties music. Diwan shahrayar offers meza grilled meats and arabic desserts with belly dancers shows. The ikebana night club hosts arabic comedy nights every weekend. The royal spa spread over four levels and 3 500 m2 of space boasts panoramic views of the mediterranean sea an indoor swimming pool indoor and outdoor jacuzzi sauna mud bath and turkish bath aerobics classes personal training squash and tennis in addition to many unique spa treatments. The watergate aqua park spread over 20 000 m2 is one of the largest in the middle east featuring exciting rides multiple swimming pools and casual dining. . North located in the heart of downtown, beirut most vibrant business district, le patio is a step away from all your favorite signature shops, restaurants and nightlife. Our 41rooms boutique hotel is the ideal choice for those who appreciate cozy ambiance and gracious service.
